statements: SELECT * FROM energy_usage_records ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT energy_usage, time_period FROM energy_usage_records WHERE energy_usage > 100 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;
SELECT AVG(energy_usage) AS average_usage FROM energy_usage_records;
SELECT record_id, energy_usage FROM energy_usage_records WHERE record_id BETWEEN 3 AND 6;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_records WHERE time_period LIKE '2022%' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_records WHERE energy_usage > 1000 ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT record_id, energy_usage FROM energy_usage_records WHERE record_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY energy_usage ASC;
SELECT time_period, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy FROM energy_usage_records GROUP BY time_period HAVING total_energy > 5000;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_records WHERE time_period LIKE '2022%' AND energy_usage < 5000;
SELECT MAX(energy_usage) AS max_energy_usage, MIN(energy_usage) AS min_energy_usage FROM energy_usage_records;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage;
SELECT id, energy_consumed, time_period FROM energy_usage;
SELECT trend_name FROM energy_trends WHERE trend_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM energy_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%renewable%';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM energy_trends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage WHERE id = 1 ORDER BY time_period DESC;
SELECT energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE time_period > '2022-01-01' AND energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed ASC;
SELECT id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy FROM energy_usage GROUP BY id HAVING total_energy > 500;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage eu JOIN energy_trends et ON eu.id = et.trend_id WHERE et.trend_name LIKE '%sustainable%';
SELECT AVG(energy_consumed) AS avg_energy_consumed FROM energy_usage WHERE time_period BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_2021;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM energy_usage_2021 WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT MIN(energy_consumed), MAX(energy_consumed) FROM energy_usage_2021;
SELECT id, trend_type FROM energy_trends ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_2022 WHERE energy_consumed < 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_usage_2021 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, energy_consumed FROM energy_usage_2022 WHERE energy_consumed > 1000
SELECT * FROM energy_trends WHERE trend_type LIKE 'Renewable%'
SELECT id, trend_description FROM energy_trends WHERE trend_description IS NOT NULL
SELECT id, timestamp FROM energy_usage_2021 WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption
SELECT name, energy_value FROM energy_consumers INNER JOIN energy_readings ON energy_consumers.consumer_id = energy_readings.time_period_id
SELECT MAX(energy_value) AS max_energy_value, MIN(energy_value) AS min_energy_value FROM energy_readings

SELECT energy_consumers.name, energy_consumption.consumption_value, time_periods.start_time, time_periods.end_time FROM energy_consumers INNER JOIN energy_consumption ON energy_consumers.consumer_id = energy_consumption.consumer_id INNER JOIN time_periods ON energy_consumption.reading_id = time_periods.time_period_id
SELECT * FROM time_periods WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM time_periods;
SELECT reading_id, energy_value FROM energy_readings WHERE energy_value > 100;
SELECT c.consumer_id, c.name, ec.consumption_value FROM energy_consumers c JOIN energy_consumption ec ON c.consumer_id = ec.consumer_id;
SELECT e.reading_id, e.energy_value, ep.start_time, ep.end_time FROM energy_readings e JOIN time_periods ep ON e.time_period_id = ep.time_period_id;
SELECT ec.consumption_id, ec.consumption_value, er.energy_value FROM energy_consumption ec JOIN energy_readings er ON ec.reading_id = er.reading_id WHERE ec.consumption_value < 50;
SELECT * FROM Energy_Usage_Recordings
SELECT id, timestamp, energy_value FROM Energy_Usage_Recordings WHERE energy_value > 100
SELECT * FROM Daily_Energy_Totals ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, average_energy FROM Monthly_Energy_Averages WHERE average_energy < 50
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Energy_Trends
SELECT * FROM Energy_Usage_Recordings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, energy_value FROM Energy_Usage_Recordings WHERE energy_value > 100 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT AVG(energy_value) AS average_energy FROM Energy_Usage_Recordings
SELECT date, SUM(total_energy) AS total_energy FROM Daily_Energy_Totals GROUP BY date HAVING total_energy > 500
SELECT trend_name, CONCAT('Description: ', trend_description) AS full_description FROM Energy_Trends
